Vehicle Shipping  At Its Best
with  Albatross Auto Shipping

 

Albatross Auto Shipping is a leading car shipping company offering top-notch transport services for personal vehicles, motorcycles, and heavy equipment within all 50 states and beyond.

 

Whether it is individual or corporate vehicle moves, we offer a variety of options to fit your needs, including door-to-door, expedited, open-trailer, and enclosed car shipping. With over 40,000 vetted carriers and a commitment to quality, you can trust us to safely and securely transport your vehicle. Our expertise and commitment to quality are reflected in our successful record of shipping over 12,000 vehicles and earning the trust of over 10,000 happy customers.

Reviews

Proactive with Communication

The process was smooth and our car pick up and arrival were just as promised. The driver was friendly and communicative. Our transportation agent did a great job and was proactive with communication and details. I'm sold! No more cross country driving for our family - we will be repeat customers for sure!

5.0

Kenny W

Date: 10/13/2022

Repeat Customer

I used this company twice to transport my vehicle from Florida to N.Y. and back. It was a great experience right from the beginning. Also good customer service. Delivery guy was very professional too. Highly recommend!

5.0

Amy Darina

Date: 10/15/2022

A Fairly Simple Process

It was a fairly simple process. You speak to someone about posting your car for delivery, give dates available, they find you a trucking company, your car gets shipped. Communication was actually reasonable and through a few phone calls I was able to track the progress of my car.

5.0

Dave Brown

Date: 2/1/2023

Very Communicative

Albatross Auto Shipping was very communicative and kind to schedule the transportation of the vehicle. The process was straightforward and fast. I received my car on the scheduled day. I’ll work with them again. I recommend working with them. Thank you for all!

5.0

Alex P.

Date: 2/2/2023

Professional And Courteous

They shipped my car from LA to Dallas. This team is awesome - they always provided on time transit updates about my car - upon delivery, they were patient enough to wait for payment and overall, car arrived in the best condition earlier than they promised

5.0

No hidden fees

I shipped a car from Florida to Texas for my 20yrs daughter and Albatross Auto Shipping have walked me through this entire process with great Professionalism, right away response, up front with pricing no hidden fees after you agreed or signed contract. More so great driver, took a lot of pictures and very patience. I ran behind on time for pickup and the driver treated me as I was early, LOL! Awesome!! Great company and counter part!

5.0

Margarita A

Date: 12/08/2022

BEYOND EXPECTATIONS!

BEYOND EXPECTATIONS! Thank you to Albatross Auto Shipping for making this part of my cross country move the easiest part. Professional, courteous, and they were able to accommodate my schedule. My car arrived in excellent condition and ready to drive.

5.0

Annamarie R

Date: 12/10/2022

A Competitive Quote

Requested quote to ship car from Hartford to Chicago from Albatross Auto Shipping on Wednesday. Fred immediately provided me with a competitive quote. Signed contract on Thursday. Car picked up on Friday as promised and delivered to Chicago on Monday as promised. No hassles. Fred provided excellent service, following up with me to be certain car was picked up on time and then dropped off on time. Would definitely recommend this company.

5.0
